creator: Software Easy To Use
descriptionHtml:
Anyone looking for a screen mirroring program should look into it. Mirroring your Android screen with Screen Mirroring is a helpful and simple tool.

Screen Mirroring is a new and innovative app - Cast Phone to TV, This feature allows you to mirror your smartphone's screen on your smart TV in high quality and real-time speed. On big TV screen, you can simply access all types of media files, mobile games, photos, music, videos, job presentations, and other applications.

You can effortlessly wirelessly link your smartphone to your TV. You can effortlessly search for and stream your favorite TV shows and series from anywhere on your TV screen.
In a few simple steps, make screen share together with your family or friends.

Protects your data, files, and programs by providing a secure connection. Screen Mirroring is straightforward to set up and utilize.

Save your eyes from the small phone screen by watching TV series shows on the big screen in the family room.. Download this free and stable TV mirroring and screen share app!

Multiple Devices Supported
- Most smart TVs, LG, Samsung, Sony, TCL, Xiaomi, Hisense, etc.
- Google Chromecast
- Any cast
- Further DLNA Receivers
- Wireless adapters of the many varieties

FEATURES:
✦ Cast smartphone screen to big TV screen stably
✦ Simple & fast connection with just a click
✦ Cast the mobile game to your big-screen TV
✦ Cast to TV, Live video on Twitch, YouTube and BIGO LIVE
✦ All media files, including photographs, audios, E-books, PDFs, and more, are supported.
✦ Show demos in an exceedingly conference, and revel in travel slideshows together with your family.
✦ To supply an exquisite expertise, use a neat and clean computer programme.
✦ Screen share in period of time speed.

How to start mirroring?

1) The TV should be connected to wireless local area network same as your phone.
2) Activate the Miracast screen on your TV
3) Enable Wireless option on your phone
4) Click the Select button and select your TV
5) Enjoy streaming your phone to TV!

All Android smartphones and Android versions allow Screen Mirroring app.
Please contact us if you have any issues with your smartphone.

Anyone looking for a screen mirroring program should look into it. Mirroring your Android screen with Screen Mirroring is a helpful and simple tool.

Screen Mirroring is a new and innovative app - Cast Phone to TV, This feature allows you to mirror your smartphone's screen on your smart TV in high quality and real-time speed. On big TV screen, you can simply access all types of media files, mobile games, photos, music, videos, job presentations, and other applications.

You can effortlessly wirelessly link your smartphone to your TV. You can effortlessly search for and stream your favorite TV shows and series from anywhere on your TV screen.
In a few simple steps, make screen share together with your family or friends.

Protects your data, files, and programs by providing a secure connection. Screen Mirroring is straightforward to set up and utilize.

Save your eyes from the small phone screen by watching TV series shows on the big screen in the family room.. Download this free and stable TV mirroring and screen share app!

Multiple Devices Supported
- Most smart TVs, LG, Samsung, Sony, TCL, Xiaomi, Hisense, etc.
- Google Chromecast
- Any cast
- Further DLNA Receivers
- Wireless adapters of the many varieties

FEATURES:
✦ Cast smartphone screen to big TV screen stably
✦ Simple & fast connection with just a click
✦ Cast the mobile game to your big-screen TV
✦ Cast to TV, Live video on Twitch, YouTube and BIGO LIVE
✦ All media files, including photographs, audios, E-books, PDFs, and more, are supported.
✦ Show demos in an exceedingly conference, and revel in travel slideshows together with your family.
✦ To supply an exquisite expertise, use a neat and clean computer programme.
✦ Screen share in period of time speed.

How to start mirroring?

1) The TV should be connected to wireless local area network same as your phone.
2) Activate the Miracast screen on your TV
3) Enable Wireless option on your phone
4) Click the Select button and select your TV
5) Enjoy streaming your phone to TV!

All Android smartphones and Android versions allow Screen Mirroring app.
Please contact us if you have any issues with your smartphone.
